sentences.en: A: Why did the mayor demote the official?
sentences.cn: 为什麽市长要把这名官员降职?

sentences.en: An employer who has lost confidence in the ability of an employee may demote him.
sentences.cn: 雇佣人对被雇佣人之能力失去信心时得予以降职.

sentences.en: Demote - Players can demote other players in the guild.
sentences.cn: 降级–该成员能够降低其他成员的工会等级.

sentences.en: Demote: This allows the guild leader to demote members within the guild to lower ranks.
sentences.cn: 降级: 这个功能允许会长将会员降级到低级阶层.

sentences.en: I should demote you from senior minister to elder.
sentences.cn: 我要把你从高级牧师降级为长老.

sentences.en: The sergeant was demoted to private.
To demote a field, select the field and then click Demote on the toolbar.
sentences.cn: 若要降级字段, 请选择字段,再单击工具栏上的“降级”.

sentences.en: We will endanger our country if we demote our most noble and talented citizens.

trans.tran_en: to make someone’s rank or position lower or less important
